meanings.definition: Unable to be explained or understood.
meanings.sent1: The sudden disappearance of the toy was inexplicable to the child.
meanings.sent2: The mystery surrounding the ancient artifact was truly inexplicable.
meanings.sent3: It was inexplicable how the cat managed to open the locked door.
meanings.sent4: The beauty of the sunset was as inexplicable as it was breathtaking.
meanings.sent5: The feeling of deja vu was inexplicable but strangely comforting.

meanings.definition: Impossible to account for or understand.
meanings.sent1: The inexplicable behavior of the squirrel left everyone puzzled.
meanings.sent2: The decision to cancel the event seemed inexplicable to the attendees.
meanings.sent3: It was inexplicable why the cake disappeared so quickly at the party.
meanings.sent4: The inexplicable bond between the two friends was truly special.
meanings.sent5: The inexplicable magic of the forest filled her with wonder.
